title: The Original Fairies
description: Seventeen and a half years after the supernatural town, Pine Lake burned to the ground, Mirandaâ€™s father has made the town safer than ever from those who previously threatened the town. Miranda seems to have the perfect storybook life, as her father has sheltered her from harm for so many years. After her high school graduation, Miranda prepares to take the crown and become Queen of Pine Lake, but as dangerous storms roll through the seemingly perfect town, Miranda begins to discover new truth about her life and the past.  When the big night finally arrives and Miranda is crowned Queen, she is suddenly taken from her beloved father and safe town to a place where everything is unusual and strange. Miranda has to grow up quickly, to face a new demon that threatens to destroy her innocence, her relationships and her world. As skeletons from the past continue to emerge, Miranda must find a way to escape her luxury-masked prison and save life on Earth and the people she loves.  The Portal to Sidhe is the first book in a supernatural series full of mystical adventures. Reunite with beloved characters, and meet both exciting and evil new characters in the first book of The Sidhe Series, a novel full of action, romance and the supernatural.
author: Kelsey Schaeffer
